author: Emmos IT-Services Shop, Web <ebusiness@emmos.de>
description: Gatsby based Shop frontend for Lusini
name: lusini

scripts.build: gatsby clean && npm run setup:lusini_de-de && npm run build_go && npm run move:lusini_de-de
scripts.build_go: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 GATSBY_EXPERIMENTAL_PAGE_BUILD_ON_DATA_CHANGES=true NODE_PATH=src gatsby build --prefix-paths --log-pages  && npm run prestorybook  && npm run storybook:build

scripts.fireside:build: cp .npmrc "node_modules/@kaminrunde/fireside-app" && cd "node_modules/@kaminrunde/fireside-app" && yarn install && cd ../../.. && fireside-build
